channel.title: CVE Feed for Netis Korea -- D'live set-top box AP(WF2429TB)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Netis Korea -- D'live set-top box AP(WF2429TB)

item.title: CVE-2020-7842|2024-08-04T09:41:01.879Z -- netis%20korea -- d%27live%20set-top%20box%20ap%28wf2429tb%29
item.description: Improper Input validation vulnerability exists in Netis Korea D'live AP which could cause arbitrary command injection and execution when the time setting (using ntpServerlp1 parameter) for the users. This affects D'live set-top box AP(WF2429TB) v1.1.10.
